title: Rates of Change - describing change from a graph

content.question: ​The function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals x squared plus 3 x minus 5"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></math>. Which of the following describes <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> ?

choices.label: ​For any interval of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math>, the function always has a positive rate of change.
​For any interval of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math>, the function always has a negative rate of change.

​For any interval of <math alttext="x less than negative 1.5"><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1.5</mn></math>, the function has a positive rate of change, and for any interval of <math alttext="x greater than negative 1.5"><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1.5</mn></math>, the function has a negative rate of change.

​For any interval of <math alttext="x less than negative 1.5"><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1.5</mn></math>, the function has a negative rate of change, and for any interval of <math alttext="x greater than negative 1.5"><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1.5</mn></math>, the function has a positive rate of change.

content.answer: ​For any interval of <math alttext="x less than negative 1.5"><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1.5</mn></math>, the function has a negative rate of change, and for any interval of <math alttext="x greater than negative 1.5"><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1.5</mn></math>, the function has a positive rate of change.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
